results.title: Alcoholism.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Benzodiazepines @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001569 @@@Benzodiazepines@@@ remain the most effective medications for the treatment of @CHEMICAL_Alcohols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000438 @@@alcohol@@@ withdrawal and for the prevention of withdrawal @DISEASE_Seizures @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizures@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003693 @@@delirium@@@, even though the adrenergic agents @CHEMICAL_Clonidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003000 @@@clonidine@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ may hasten resolution of @DISEASE_Substance_Withdrawal_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D013375 @@@withdrawal symptoms@@@ and facilitate @SPECIES_9606 @@@outpatient@@@ detoxification.
